idea: Established in the year 1997 at Mumbai, Maharashtra, India, We "Flowmax Valves" are Sole Proprietorship firm involved as the Manufacturer, Wholesale, Trader of Spirax Valve, L&T Valve, Thermodynamic Steam Trap, Audco Valve, and KSB Valve and much more. All our products are getting widely acclaimed among the large clientele for their exclusive designs, superior quality, and reliability. Apart from this, our ability to maintain timelines as well as quality in the assortment, providing cost-effective solutions and assurance to make timely shipment of the orders placed by customers have assisted us positioning our name in the list of top-notch companies of the industry.
name: FLOWMAX VALVES

idea: BHUMI REALTY VENTURES IS REGISTERED AS LLP AND IS IN THE BUSINESS OF CONSTRUCTION AND LOOKING FOR NEW PROJECTS IN CONSTRUCTION
name: BHUMI REALTY VENTURES LLP

idea:
We introduce ourselves as Concretech Infrastructure Private Limited. We are leading Ready-Mix Concrete Supplier pan India since from last 15 year. At Concretech Infrastructure Private Limited, we believe in manufacturing products that provide strength to the structure, while keeping in mind the need for building material to be eco-friendly in nature. Our products are helping us bridge the gap between customer satisfaction and eco-efficiency.

 

We have a team of experts who have vast experience in manufacturing concrete. Our concrete machines, delivery trucks and equipment’s are operated by specialists. We offer

 

The components of the concrete are revolved and mixed proportionally to improve the quality of the final product and is delivered on time.

We manufacture concrete mixes of various grades that are specially designed concrete solutions with high-class design technology.
name: CONCRETECH INFRASTRUCTURE PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
At EDGE-IN-ASIA RECRUITMENT PRIVATE LIMITED, we have the network, expertise, and knowledge to source the best global talent for businesses in Asia.

Our goal is single-minded — to provide clients with the competitive edge needed to source key talents across all aspects of their business. We promise to provide the same excellent service and careful attention to all of our clients, no matter their size.

We partner with companies and individuals that understand the value of working closely with their recruitment partners, and treasure a relationship built on trust, mutual respect, and professionalism. Our partnership will be based on integrity, accountability, and we vow to be transparent, communicative, and always passionate about what we do.
name: EDGE-IN-ASIA RECRUITMENT PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
NEWON GREENTECH LLP  is a A fastest growing company managed by experienced professionals, engaged in supplying all kind of water and waste water treatment plants, chemicals and spares. Additionally, Newon Greentech also offers annual maintenance, Operation & maintenance, and consultancy services. Our company focuses on customer service excellence and superior quality product supply, delivered through highly trained staff members who have invaluable experience and expertise in the water treatment industry.

Our organization is a dependable manufacturer, supplier, trader and service provider of all types of water, waste water & waste management products. The designs laid for these products are under the supervision of diligent & experienced engineers. These experts work towards developing international standard systems and other products, which comply with the industry norms. For our honourable customer, we make our range available at high affordable rates. We manage our organization and water resources to meet evolving regulatory requirements, water supply needs and customer expectations in the future.
name: NEWON GREENTECH LLP

idea: In this era of automation, Just Local strives to enhance your daily shopping experience by bringing it online. From purchasing regular groceries to taking insurance, we got it all covered for you. We have partnered with Local Kirana Stores and guess what? All their services are made online to optimize your shopping capabilities. We give you miscellaneous choices to choose from and all you need is to pick from the grand bag. Just local aspires to empower cable operators by transcending their business opportunities and making them achieve the unachievable. If you have loyal customers that are glued to you for the last 20 years, then we furnish you with a unique chance to boost their satisfaction.
name: MEGA2MINI NETWORKS PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
POWERLOOK APPARELS PRIVATE LIMITED one-stop destination where you can spend your hard-earned money on getting the best value-for-money deals. We're dedicated to giving you the very best of men’s casual wear, with a focus on the best style, comfort and affordability. Powerlook is one of the fastest-growing e-commerce brands in India which offers a unique range of men’s casual wear with a shade of western touch. We are the pioneers of bringing western style in the Indian market at very affordable rates.

We entered the men’s casual wear category to offer a product trend that was different from the regular clothing range available at other retailers and brands. We are not only the pioneers of our product range in India but have also set the trend for others to follow. With the success of our retail shops, soon we registered our own brand of clothing range - Urban Estilo. The achievements of Urban Estilo further fuelled our passion to take the brand of Powerlook online. Our online e-commerce platform, powerlook.in, and our retail stores are the only place now to buy the Urban Estilo clothing range.

Our USP lies in offering our customers the very best in terms of design and comfort, while at the same time ensuring that our products are available at affordable rates. With our business progressing at a great pace, we have ambitious plans to take our brand to the next level by foraying into international markets. We hope you enjoy our exciting product range as much as we enjoy offering them to you - our valued patrons. If you have any questions or comments, please do not hesitate to contact us.
name: POWERLOOK APPARELS PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: Greater Upliftment and Inclusive Development Enterprises Private Limited is a government registered company under the Companies Act, 2013. We are a social enterprise that works for enabling employment generation activities especially at the grassroots level. Unemployment has been one of the major challenges of the Indian economy. To solve the problem of unemployment it is important that employment generating activities are run efficiently at the grassroots level.
name: GREATER UPLIFTMENT & INCLUSIVE DEVELOPMENT ENTERPRISES PRIVATE LIMITED

name: Image Computer Solution

idea:
We are students of computer science engineering in India. The covid-19 pandemic is having a massive impact on educational activity. In a matter of weeks, entire education systems from elementary to higher education had to completely transform activities to evolve into an online teaching-learning scenario. But the biggest issue we faced during this shift was the lack of interaction between students and teachers.

So, we have produced an educational platform “EDU FLARES (eduflares.com) “, which works on virtual reality (VR) and Metaverse concepts. It shall be a great achievement if we shift our traditional education system to virtual reality-based education.


Our mission is that all the college students of India should be aware of the work happening in the big industry during their college days so that they can get work in any industry in the future.


Our vision is that the students of India should learn the work of the big industry in their college days in a very good manner so that they can contribute with their knowledge in the making of India.
name: EDU FLARES
